hymn.title: Jesus is the Lord, and He lives in me
hymn.chords: | C - F/C - | C - - - | C - G7/D - | C - C7 - | F - Dm - | Em - Am C/G | F - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus is the Lord, and He lives in me; Now I'm as hap -- py as I can be. O Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! O Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Je -- sus lives in me!

lyrics.stanza: Jesus is the Lord, and He lives in me; Now I'm as happy as I can be. O Hallelujah! O Hallelujah! Jesus lives in me!
All the world is filled with vanity; Jesus is the one reality. O Hallelujah! O Hallelujah! Jesus lives in me!
